translation:
The enemy is half a league away from our army, the advanced troops engage almost every day, and the general attack is approaching.

It is in this situation that Your Excellency Your Excellency Candiotinha is on the road, and Bento Manuel just below, on the opposite side, in the field of Conceição, with equal force, and without daring to advance a step. To join with the Brigade of Colonel João Antônio I suppose that our army will come to the Jaguarão points where Your Excellency Your Excellency

God keep you many years.

Farm of Neto in Jaguarão Chico, November 26, 1836.

God keep you many years. Farm of Neto in Jaguarão Chico, November 26, 1836. Domingos José de Almeida. Colonel General Quartermaster.

Most Illustrious Sir Bernardino Rodrigues Barcelos Filho. Cerro Largo. From the Colonel General Quartermaster.
